General.Name: Beijing VRV Software Corp Ltd
General.Description: Beijing VRV Software Corporation Limited develops and sells information security products and solutions in China. It offers secure communications mobile office services; security big data; border security; data security; host security services; and industrial control security services, as well as support services. The company also provides technology solutions, including terminal security integrated solution, electronic document security, and network security big data solution; customs protection solutions, such as level protection, intranet security, and customs; industry solutions for energy, financial, power, and healthcare industries; and blockchain machine application solutions. In addition, it offers computer system services; data processing; software services; application software services; research and development of computer software, hardware, and communication equipment; technology promotion and transfer; technical training, maintenance, consultation, service, and sales; production and assembly of computer software and hardware; reproduction of recording media; import and export of technology and goods. The company was formerly known as Beijing Beixinyuan Automation Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Beijing VRV Software Corporation Limited. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Block C, Zhongguancun Science and Techno, Beijing, China, 100081
